extendedInfo.description: Want to test your knowledge of the worldâs history? Try this exciting 1 quiz and 2 player quiz battle and see if you know how many minutes Neil Armstrong spend on the moon, which US President said I cannot tell a lie, when was Nelson Mandela sentenced to life in Prison or when did Titanic sink?Please note that questions are in English.The history trivia features a single player and a thrilling two player heads-up mode on the same phone.- Sharpen your skills in the single player mode and reach the top of the high score list.- In the heads-up mode you can challenge your friends on the same phone and see who knows the most about the history of our world- Questions range from World War 2, famous presidents, Independence Day of different countries, inventions, historic landmarks, North Pole and historic persons such as John F. Kennedy, Florence Nightingale, the Nazis, Hitler, Captain Cook, Christoffer Columbus, Napoleon, King Edward and many more.

reviews.title: Dodgy
reviews.comment: My virus scanner picked up on this and I uninstalled it for safety reasons.
reviews.author: Richard Hossen
